verbs.description: The nomination of [ARG1: Gina Haspel] by President Trump to [V: become] [ARG2: CIA Director] has revived the debate over the activity of water boarding , known as enhanced interrogation . What are some of the commonsense guidelines available to those who wish to do things according to a moral code , but value the lives of our children more than virtue signaling or our reputation within left - wing
